that?\""},{"lineNumber":125612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この乳を俺以外の男に吸わせたくない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want any other man to suck these breasts.\""},{"lineNumber":125613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well...\""},{"lineNumber":125614,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの言葉がよほど意外だったのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"It seemed that Rance's words were quite unexpected,"},{"lineNumber":125615,"originalJapaneseLine":"五十六は思わずクスリと笑みをこぼした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Isoroku unconsciously let out a small smile."},{"lineNumber":125616,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは五十六の体をたっぷりと楽しんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance thoroughly enjoyed Isoroku's body."},{"lineNumber":125617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「独眼流は伊達じゃない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The one-eyed style isn't just for show!\""},{"lineNumber":125618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":125619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やあ、ランス、シィル殿」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Rance, Lady Syl.\""},{"lineNumber":125620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんにちは、政宗様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hello, Lord Masamune.\""},{"lineNumber":125621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「目玉が城内で歩いてるとやっぱ目立つな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"An eyeball walking around the castle really stands out.\""},{"lineNumber":125622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, that's true."},{"lineNumber":125623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ジロジロ見られて少し落ち着かんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Being stared at makes me a bit uneasy,"},{"lineNumber":125624,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ仕方ない」","translatedEnglishLine":"but it can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":125625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのうち、皆も慣れてくれるだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eventually, everyone will get used to it.\""},{"lineNumber":125626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「目玉が歩いたり喋ったりなんて気持ち悪い。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"An eyeball walking and talking is disgusting."},{"lineNumber":125627,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが理由で苛められたりしてないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you being bullied because of that?\""},{"lineNumber":125628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"R-Rance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":125629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":125630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな暴言を堂々と吐く男は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The only man I know who would boldly say such hateful things,"},{"lineNumber":125631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の知る限り一人しかいないな」","translatedEnglishLine":"as far as I know, is just one.\""},{"lineNumber":125632,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、ひどい奴もいるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, there really are terrible people."},{"lineNumber":125633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目玉だって頑張って生きてるのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even an eyeball is trying hard to live.\""},{"lineNumber":125634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに、俺なら気にしてない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I don't care.\""},{"lineNumber":125635,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そか、強く生きろよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, live strongly then.\""},{"lineNumber":125636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":125637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":125638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な……仲良しさん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha... are they close friends...?\""},{"lineNumber":125639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":125640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「梵天丸。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bontenmaru."},{"lineNumber":125641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　訓練、終わったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Training's over, right?\""},{"lineNumber":125642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お町。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-machi."},{"lineNumber":125643,"originalJapaneseLine":"　迎えに来てくれたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"You came to pick me up, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":125644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah."},{"lineNumber":125645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日の梵天丸のお背中流し当番は我だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm the one responsible for washing Bontenmaru's back today.\""},{"lineNumber":125646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":125647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに両手両足当番があたしー」","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, I'm in charge of the hands and feet."},{"lineNumber":125648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして前を洗う当番がノワール」","translatedEnglishLine":"And Noir is responsible for washing the front."},{"lineNumber":125649,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違うー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's not right!\""},{"lineNumber":125650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昨日野菊のご飯あーん権と","translatedEnglishLine":"Yesterday, I traded the feeding-rights from Nogiku,"},{"lineNumber":125651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　交換したでしょー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"didn't I?!\""},{"lineNumber":125652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そだっけ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Was that right?\""},{"lineNumber":125653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It is!\""},{"lineNumber":125654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日の添い寝当番は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Today's sleeping companion duty is...\""},{"lineNumber":125655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あたしとお町姐さんだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Me and O-machi-neesan.\""},{"lineNumber":125656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、歯磨き当番――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, the tooth-brushing duty--\""},{"lineNumber":125657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それも私ー！　一昨日交換したでしょー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's mine too! Didn't we swap that the day before yesterday?!\""},{"lineNumber":125658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ……ノワール今日することない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... Noir has nothing to do today...\""},{"lineNumber":125659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もーう……ノワールはその日の気分で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez... Noir swaps duties so easily depending on her mood,"},{"lineNumber":125660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに誰かと交換するから","translatedEnglishLine":"she ends up losing all her duties quickly."},{"lineNumber":125661,"originalJapaneseLine":"　当番がなくなっちゃうんだよー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"She ends up with no duties at all...\""},{"lineNumber":125662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then--\""},{"lineNumber":125663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「政宗様、甘やかしては駄目です、駄目ですよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Masamune, you mustn't spoil her, not at all!\""},{"lineNumber":125664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes. That's true."},{"lineNumber":125665,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分かってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand.\""},{"lineNumber":125666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ノワール……今日することない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Noir... has nothing to do today...?"},{"lineNumber":125667,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ないのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nothing at all...?\""},{"lineNumber":125668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":125669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、野菊の絵本当番交換したげる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I'll swap the picture book duty from Nogiku for you.\""},{"lineNumber":125670,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仕方ないから、折女ねーさんの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I guess it can't be helped, so I'll take Orejo-neesan's...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この乳を俺以外の男に吸わせたくない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want any other man to suck these breasts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの言葉がよほど意外だったのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seemed that Rance's words were quite unexpected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六は思わずクスリと笑みをこぼした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isoroku unconsciously let out a small smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは五十六の体をたっぷりと楽しんだ。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one-eyed style isn't just for show!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「目玉が城内で歩いてるとやっぱ目立つな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An eyeball walking around the castle really stands out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジロジロ見られて少し落ち着かんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being stared at makes me a bit uneasy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのうち、皆も慣れてくれるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eventually, everyone will get used to it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「目玉が歩いたり喋ったりなんて気持ち悪い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An eyeball walking and talking is disgusting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが理由で苛められたりしてないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you being bullied because of that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな暴言を堂々と吐く男は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The only man I know who would boldly say such hateful things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の知る限り一人しかいないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as far as I know, is just one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目玉だって頑張って生きてるのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even an eyeball is trying hard to live."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迎えに来てくれたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You came to pick me up, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日の梵天丸のお背中流し当番は我だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the one responsible for washing Bontenmaru's back today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに両手両足当番があたしー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, I'm in charge of the hands and feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして前を洗う当番がノワール」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And Noir is responsible for washing the front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日野菊のご飯あーん権と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yesterday, I traded the feeding-rights from Nogiku,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしとお町姐さんだよー」
「それも私ー！　一昨日交換したでしょー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's mine too! Didn't we swap that the day before yesterday?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ……ノワール今日することない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... Noir has nothing to do today..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もーう……ノワールはその日の気分で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez... Noir swaps duties so easily depending on her mood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに誰かと交換するから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she ends up losing all her duties quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当番がなくなっちゃうんだよー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She ends up with no duties at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「政宗様、甘やかしては駄目です、駄目ですよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Masamune, you mustn't spoil her, not at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ノワール……今日することない……
「じゃあ、野菊の絵本当番交換したげる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I'll swap the picture book duty from Nogiku for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ないから、折女ねーさんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I guess it can't be helped, so I'll take Orejo-neesan's..."

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日の梵天丸のお背中流し当番は我だ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに両手両足当番があたしー」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしとお町姐さんだよー」
「それも私ー！　一昨日交換したでしょー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's mine too! Didn't we swap that the day before yesterday?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ……ノワール今日することない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... Noir has nothing to do today..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もーう……ノワールはその日の気分で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez... Noir swaps duties so easily depending on her mood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに誰かと交換するから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she ends up losing all her duties quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当番がなくなっちゃうんだよー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She ends up with no duties at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「政宗様、甘やかしては駄目です、駄目ですよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Masamune, you mustn't spoil her, not at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ノワール……今日することない……
「じゃあ、野菊の絵本当番交換したげる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I'll swap the picture book duty from Nogiku for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ないから、折女ねーさんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I guess it can't be helped, so I'll take Orejo-neesan's..."
